description:
Clinton Francis "Clint" Barton, also known as Hawkeye, was an extremely skilled marksman, a special agent of S.H.I.E.L.D., and one of the candidates for the Avengers Initiative before being killed by Hank Pym like all other candidates.

#WhatIfShow #WhatIfMarvel #JeremyRenner #ClintBarton #ClintonFrancisBarton #Hawkeye
